bolsa_text:
Do you want to be part of our team?
Send us your CV and we will contact you shortly.
contact_text:
Do you have any questions or comments?
Write to us and we will contact you shortly.
delivery_text:
Our restaurants specialize in Italian cuisine, fresh, authentic, and original.
Everything is handmade daily in our kitchen using traditional and original recipes.
delivery_title: Which branch would you like to order from?
events_text:
Do you want to hold an event with us? Let us organize your next event in one of our restaurants and exclusive event spaces, each branch has a different dynamic that we can customize for your special event.
Contact us for more information and quotes!
events_title: Private spaces for dinners and events
home_nosotros_text: We are an Italian tradition restaurant founded in 2014, where we respect the classic flavors of Italy and integrate them with fresh and quality local products to offer a renewed culinary experience. We believe that good food not only nourishes the body, but also connects people, and that's why we strive to create a welcoming and family-friendly atmosphere, where every visit is a memorable experience.
home_nosotros_text2: "A meal without wine is like a day without sunshine." At Oliva, each wine list is carefully selected to offer a unique proposal with labels from around the world.
